snippet: With discretion and sumptuousness, residences away from home cater to the well-off.
abstract: Hotel chains are seeing an under-served niche market in longer-term or extended-stay residences that offer amenities or residential ambiance to higher-income individuals looking for lodgings for longer stays; benefits include all the features of great hotels with the privacy of condominiums and apartments.
lead_paragraph: With discretion and sumptuousness, residences away from home cater to the well-off.

headline.main: Luxury Long-Term Lodging Begins to Feel Like Home
headline.print_headline: Luxury Long-Term Lodging Begins to Feel Like Home
